channel.title: I got 20 liters of mineral oil
channel.description:
And I don't know what to do with it.
Suggestions?

item.title: I got 20 liters of mineral oil
item.dc:creator: BrAndi
item.description:
You could make very good petroleum jelly out of that. It can be used to build a nice composite bomb together with potassium chlorate and an igniter.

Try mixing it with diesel (50:50). It should smoke like hell if you ignite it. Be careful though. Diesel fires are hard to put out + if the surface of the diesel gets in contact with too much oxygen and heat, the Diesel will blow.

Diesel can be hard to ignite though, you need something like 200°C and then it is only the fumes burning.

Try this for the (smoke) bomb: Take a plastic bottle of water (glass bottle if you want shrapnell) and fill it up with 3/4 Diesel and 1/4 Mineral oil. Then throw in a good firecracker (with or without extended fuse, the bigger the better) and cover all of your body behins something solid.

I am not responsible for any injuries btw. Any chemists here? Ram had lots of chemistry I think, where is he when you need him… I’m just an amateur.

Read full topic

Imonfire:

It was for a school project. We built a mineral oil-cooled computer. It worked, but the computer is shit (somebody gave it to us for the sake of the project) so I don’t really want to keep it.

Use it on a computer that isn’t shit.
